data.01: Location Address Message - Unrelated addresses of business locations
data.02: Location Relation Information - Addresses for associated business locations
data.03: Report Message - A human-readable report intended to be put on paper
data.04: Electronic Mail Message - A free-form, human-readable message intended for an electronic mail system
data.11: National Property Registry System Real Estate Property Transaction
data.15: Request with Immediate Response Required (No Follow-up)
data.16: Request with Immediate Response Required (Follow-up Required)
data.17: Request with Immediate Response to Mailbox
data.18: Response - No Further Updates to Follow
data.33: Normal - Conforming to a standard practice
data.35: Short Notice Request - The amount of time given to respond to a request is abbreviated from the normal time allotted
data.36: Damage Notification - Notification of loss or harm resulting from injury to an entity
data.37: Design Report - The arrangement of elements and details in a product of work
data.80: Uniform Commercial Code Filing with Broad Collateral Description
data.81: Uniform Commercial Code Filing with Specific Collateral Description
data.87: Disability Benefits Proof of Coverage Notification
data.A0: Requisition - A request for equipment or material
data.AC: Requisition Cancellation - A termination of a request for equipment or material
data.AD: Notice of Availability - Notification by a U.S. shipping organization that a foreign military sales shipment is available for delivery
data.AF: Requisition Follow-Up - An inquiry about a request for equipment or material
data.AM: Requisition Modification - An amendment to a request for equipment or material
data.AN: Material Obligation Inquiry - An inquiry as to the continued need for an open order
data.AP: Material Obligation Advice - A confirmation of the continued need for quantity associated with a Material Obligation Inquiry
data.AQ: Quantity Verification Inquiry - An inquiry as to the validity of the quantity associated with an open order
data.AR: Supply Assistance - An inquiry requesting extraordinary action to provide needed material based on operational conditions or requirements
data.AS: Shipment Advice - Notification by an inventory management organization providing current shipping advice relating to the outstanding requisition or order
data.AV: Quantity Verification Advice - A confirmation of the validity of the quantity associated with a Quantity Verification Inquiry
data.AW: Material Obligation Reinstatement - A request to reinstate an erroneously closed material obligation
data.AZ: Disposal Shipment Advice - Notification by a government organization providing current shipping advice relative to material being transferred for disposal
data.BM: Requisition Passing Order - An order passing an erroneously routed requisition to the appropriate source of supply
data.BN: Requisition Referral Order - An order forwarding a requisition to another source of supply when the original source cannot provide the requested material
data.BO: Procurement Cancellation - An order from an inventory control point to a procurement activity requesting that all or a portion of a procurement action be cancelled
data.BP: Procurement Modification - An order from an inventory control point to a procurement activity requesting that a procurement action be modified
data.BS: Bill of Sale Schedule - Schedule establishing a list of assets on a bill of sale
data.BW: Workers' Compensation Combined 1st and Subsequent Report
data.CE: Consolidated Credit Invoice - Indicates that the invoice is a consolidation of several detailed credit invoices; the detail, if provided, will be contained in debit memos
data.CF: Consolidated Debit Memo - Indicates that the invoice is a consolidated memo; all actual billing invoices are summarized by this consolidated memo
data.CG: Consolidated Credit Memo - Indicates that the invoice is a consolidated memo; all actual billing invoices are summarized by this consolidated memo
data.CM: Call Detail Memo - Indicates that the invoice contains details of telecommunications usage that is for information and not payable
data.CU: Cargo Outturn Report - A transportation discrepancy associated with ocean movements
data.CV: Cost Voucher - A regular of normal invoice in which the demand for payment is made incurred costs
data.DA: Due-In - A notification to an inventory control organization that a material receipt is anticipated
data.DB: Detour Billing - Billing for usage of foreign road trackage during planned maintenance or a disaster that blocks owned trackage
data.DD: Interdistrict (Pre-Kindergarten - Grade 12) Student Record - Indicates that a pre-kindergarten through grade 12 educational record, or transcript, is being sent to another pre-kindergarten through grade 12 school or school district
data.DE: Advance Receipt - A notification to a storage organization that a material receipt is anticipated
data.DF: Diesel Fuel Bill - Billing for fuel used as part of a run-through agreement when the operating road uses the fueling facilities of the owning road
data.DG: Response - A reply to an inquiry
data.DP: District to Postsecondary Student Record - Indicates that a pre-kindergarten through grade 12 educational record, or transcript, is being sent to a postsecondary educational institution or other agency or other recipient
data.EF: Engineering Installation, Right to Use, Final Bill
data.ER: Engineering Right to Use, Final Bill
data.FD: Consolidated Invoice, Final Bill - The final (last) bill for a consolidated account
data.FE: Memorandum, Final Bill - The final (last) bill for a non-payable invoice (memo)
data.FP: Flat Rate Per Unit Bill - A joint facility bill that charges all maintenance and/or operating costs based on a per unit rate set by contract
data.FR: Federal Royalty - Identifies a transaction set which reports leaseholder payment data on Federal property
data.FT: Material Returns - Notification by a military organization providing shipping information related to the return of material not needed
data.GA: Government Furnished Material Inquiry Advice - A response from a Material Control Activity (MCA) to a supply source validating the authority to process a requisition as Government Furnished Material under the terms of a stipulated contract
data.GI: Government Furnished Material Inquiry - A request from a supply source to a Material Control Activity (MCA) to validate that a requisition can be processed as Government Furnished Material under the terms of a stipulated contract
data.HP: Horsepower Equalization Bill - Billing for locomotive power purchased as part of a run-through agreement which allows train operation over trackage owned by another railroad, usually from and to facilities owned by the operating road
data.IE: Indian Royalty - Identifies a transaction set which reports leaseholder payment data on Indian tribal or allottee property
data.IR: Installation, Right to Use, Final Bill
data.IU: Material, Installation, Right to Use, Final Bill
data.IW: Workers Compensation Report of Injury or Illness
data.JM: Maintenance and Operations Bill - Maintenance and operations of a jointly owned facility
data.JO: Joint Facility Miscellaneous Bill or Other - Miscellaneous or other charges chargeable to a jointly owned facility
data.JR: Rental Bill - Rental of equipment or a facility
data.LR: Logistics Reassignment - Information related to the transfer of material management responsibility
data.MR: Material, Right to Use, Final Bill
data.NA: Material Release Order - An order issued by an accountable supply system manager directing an activity within the same supply distribution system to release and ship material
data.NB: Material Release Inquiry - A query as to the status of action taken on a previously transmitted material release order
data.NC: Material Release Order Forced Closure - Notification that an open record held for a previously transmitted material release order will be administratively closed
data.ND: Material Release Cancellation - A request from the initiator of a material release order to terminate processing on the transaction
data.NE: Disposal Release Order - An order issued by an accountable supply system manager directing an activity within the same supply distribution system to release and issue material to disposal
data.NF: Disposal Release Inquiry - A query as to the status of action taken on a previously transmitted disposal release order
data.NG: Disposal Release Cancellation - A request from the initiator of a disposal release order to terminate processing on the transaction
data.NH: Disposal Shipment Confirmation Inquiry - A query to confirm the shipment of material under a disposal release order and obtain the appropriate shipment information
data.NI: Redistribution Order - An order issued by a responsible inventory manager to an accountable supply distribution complex directing release of material to another supply distribution activity within the same supply complex
data.NJ: Material Release Confirmation - A notification from a storage site advising the originator of a material release order of the positive action taken on the order
data.NK: Material Release Denial - A notification from a storage site advising the originator of a material release order of negative (warehouse refusal) action taken on the order
data.NL: Material Release Advice - A notification from a storage site advising the originator of a material release order of the nonpositive action taken on the order
data.NM: Disposal Release Confirmation - A notification from a storage site advising the originator of a disposal release order of the positive action taken on the order
data.NP: Disposal Release Denial - A notification from a storage site advising the originator of a disposal release order of negative (warehouse refusal) action taken on the order
data.NQ: Disposal Shipment Confirmation - A notification from a storage site advising the originator of a disposal release order of the nonpositive action taken on the order
data.NR: Material Release Cancellation Advice - A notification from a storage site advising the originator of action taken on a material release cancellation
data.NT: Disposal Release Cancellation Advice - A notification from a storage site advising the originator of action taken on a disposal release cancellation
data.PI: Personal Injury Bill - A bill which shares the liability of payment for personal injuries suffered on jointly-owned trackage
data.PS: Postsecondary Student Academic Record - Indicates that a postsecondary educational record, or transcript, is being sent
data.R2: Response to Request for Enrollment Verification
data.RF: Material, Engineering, Right to Use, Final Bill
data.RG: Revised Final Bill - Code to indicate that the last bill has been recalculated due to the receipt of delayed usage, or credits; to identify unpaid overdue final accounts, which are reissued each month
data.SC: Deprescription - A structure in which a carton contains only one SKU
data.SG: Sample Goods Invoice - Covers a sample product billed to a customer for customer's review and decisions for future purchase
data.ST: State Royalty - Identifies a transaction set which reports leaseholder payment data on State property
data.SV: Supplemental Invoice - An invoice related to a previous invoice; includes only charges that were not available for the initial invoice
data.UF: Material, Engineering, Installation, Right to Use, Final Bill
data.UM: Termination Filing - Terminates a filing before the original expiration date
data.UR: Uniform Commercial Code Filing Response to Inquiry
data.UT: Continuation Filing - Continues an original filing beyond the original expiration date
data.VQ: User Facility Semi-Annual Medical Device Report
data.VR: Annual Certification of Medical Device Report
data.WC: Workers Compensation Proof of Coverage Notification
data.WO: Work Order - A bill for planned capital improvements to a jointly owned facility
data.XX: Firm Order Confirmation with Facility Information
data.ZC: Report of Assignment or Deletion of Work Candidate to Maintenance Period
data.ZD: Request Assignment of Work Candidate to Planning Maintenance Activity
data.ZE: Request for Full Work Candidate Detail
data.ZF: Report of Full Work Candidate Detail
data.ZI: Report of Work Candidate Cost/Duration Estimate
data.ZK: Report of Work Candidate Planning Services
data.ZL: Report of Assignment or Deletion of Work Candidate to Planning/Maintenance Activity
data.ZM: Request of Assignment or Deletion of Work Candidate to Maintenance Period
data.ZQ: Report of Authorized Departure From Specification
data.ZT: Report of Rejection or Return of Work Candidate
